title: The David Lynch Foundation
description: Learn how we're bringing meditation to at-risk American communities with the nonprofit David Lynch Foundation. Explore our Gift Back Cards, Candles for Peace & more.
cleaned_text: Our Partner - The David Lynch Foundation Bringing Transcendental Meditation to At-Risk Communities Our Partner - The David Lynch Foundation Bringing Transcendental Meditation to At-Risk Communities At Maharishi AyurVeda, we believe that good health comes from a mind and body in balance. Countless studies have shown that meditation is one of the most beneficial things you can do to restore your natural balance. That's why we're proud to partner with the David Lynch Foundation. About the David Lynch Foundation (DLF) Founded in 2005 by American filmmaker and director David Lynch, the David Lynch Foundation for Consciousness-Based Education and World Peace brings the [Transcendental Meditation®](https://www.tm.org/) technique to vulnerable adults and children in need, including veterans with PTSD, under-resourced youth, frontline healthcare workers, women survivors of domestic violence, and police and other first responders. Of his new world peace initiative, Lynch states "We don't know what tomorrow's going to bring if we don't get peace on this planet." Through Proceeds from Our Luxe Dosha Candle Collection We donate 100% of the proceeds from our luxurious new Dosha Luxe Candle Collection to DLF and its Meditate America initiative. More than just sweet-smelling decor statements, MAPI's new earth-friendly, non-toxic Dosha Luxe Candle Collection brings tranquility and balance to mind, body, and spirit.
